title: My pixel 2 received a notice from "enrollnotice.com"
content:
When opening pixel 2, the first thing I see is this virus info. "enrollnotice.com" says: Your system is heavely damaged by four viruses. 28.1% damaged, soon will damage sim card.    I do not trust what is wants me to do " Cleck to open Google Play and use Google free?  It seem like a scam. What should I do now?

Don
